alert.note: Alert for Buchanan (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 8:34PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Buchanan and southwestern McDowell Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 834 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Argo, or 10 miles northeast of Grundy, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... War, Bradshaw, Avondale, Stacy, Jolo and Coalwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
